name: Unity Ruby Tutorial Game
description:
Hello!

I am learning game development and this is my first (albeit small) project that I created while following a Unity tutorial (linked below).

In this tutorial I learned

  • Unity interface
  • Importing sprites
  • Using C# to run my game
  • Creating tile maps to paint my scene
  • How to implement audio in the game
  • How to implement animations in  the game
  • How to use ray-casting to create NPC's that can be interacted with
  • How to build a game for publishig
  • And more!

This was a great experience that I am taking with me as I work on my projects. The scripts are great to look back on and use in the future, and the tutorial makes sure that a variety of methods are used to provide the learner with the tools needed later on.

Link to tutorial: https://learn.unity.com/project/ruby-s-2d-rpg?uv=2019.2
